Start by building a shelter using natural materials like branches, leaves, and palm fronds. Make sure to keep it protected from the elements and predators.
Learn to fish and hunt for food. You can use a spear or a bow and arrow to catch fish or small game, and use traps to catch larger animals like rabbits or deer.
Create a fire using natural materials like wood and kindling. Use the fire to cook your food, purify water, and keep warm.
Stay hydrated by drinking rainwater or coconut water. If you don't have access to fresh water, you can also collect dew or condensation from plants.
Keep track of time by marking the position of the sun or stars. This will help you know when to start fishing or hunting, and avoid getting lost on the island.
